name: affirmationOfComplianceCode
description: A code used to affirm compliance with FDA requirements. Refer to CBP’s ACE CATAIR Appendix PGA (https://www.cbp.gov/document/guidance/ace-appendix-pga) (Food & Drug Affirmation of Compliance Codes) for valid codes.

name: affirmationOfComplianceQualifier
description:
Text describing the information required by the FDA.
For AoC codes with “no qualifier code”, this field is left blank.
All other qualifiers must follow the syntax instructions for each code as specified in CBP’s ACE CATAIR Appendix PGA (https://www.cbp.gov/document/guidance/ace-appendix-pga#wcm-survey-target-id).
